si.title: විශේෂ ගැසට් පත්රයේ නිකුත් කිරීම
body_lines: අධිකරණ අමාත්ය ආචාර්ය විජයදාස රාජපක්ෂගේ අත්සන සහිත මෙම දඩය ගැසට් පත්රයේ නිකුත් කර තිබේ.

en.title: Issue at the Special Gazette
body_lines: It has been recommended to pay a fine of Rs. 500 to Rs.
The fine has been released in the Gazette with the signature of the Minister of Justice Dr. Vijayadasa Rajapaksa.

summary_lines: A fine ranging from Rs. 500 was proposed and published in the Special Gazette, signed by Justice Minister Dr. Vijayadasa Rajapaksa.
